        horAlignments - horizontal alignments of each column. (LEFT,RIGHT or CENTER)
        verAlignments - vertical alignments of each column. (TOP,BOTTOM or CENTER)

      • modifyColumnAllignments

                                           int horAlignment,
                                           int verAlignment)
        Set same alignment for all columns.

        Parameters:
        table -
        horAlignment - horizontal alignment for every column. (LEFT,RIGHT or CENTER)
        verAlignment - vertical alignment for every column. (TOP,BOTTOM or CENTER)
